name: Public Archaeology Game
description:
An interactive 2-dimensional educational game that explains the various methods and materials used when studying archaeological samples, as well as to introduce significant artifacts and their characteristics, to raise public awareness about archaeology

This project was created by Jaime Chua, Romina Jose, and Danie Yatco for Archaeo2 under Prof. Mark A. Mabanag in the University of the Philippines Diliman.
